title: Effective Utilization Strategies for Educational Humor in English Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic English communication skills
context.additional_context: Developing humor-based strategies to enhance English learning motivation for professionals in a smartphone-based microlearning environment

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three appropriate humor types (e.g., acronyms, humor quizzes) in English classes.
Learners can generate humor directly related to the lesson content and share it with peers
Learners can propose two or more communication strategies that consider potential cultural/personal differences when using humor

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
